Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
DOS
<operating system> 1. The common abbreviation for {MS-DOS}.
2. {IBM}'s {Disk Operating System}.
3. Any {disk operating system}.
(2001-03-16)

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)
Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: DOS Disk Operating System (OS, IBM, MS, ..., PC, Apple, RCA Spectra 70)

DoS n 1: the federal department in the UnitedStates that sets and maintains foreign policies; "the Department of State was created in 1789" [syn: {Department of State}, {State Department}, {State}] 2: an operating system that is on a disk [syn: {disk operating system}]
